seed.title: Seed
seed.description: Random seed. Set for reproducible generation

go_fast.title: Go Fast
go_fast.description: Run faster predictions with additional optimizations.

guidance.title: Guidance
guidance.description: Guidance for generated image. Lower values can give more realistic images. Good values to try are 2, 2.5, 3 and 3.5

image_size.title: image_size
image_size.description: Image size for the generated image

lora_scale.title: Lora Scale
lora_scale.description: Determines how strongly the main LoRA should be applied.

aspect_ratio.title: aspect_ratio
aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio for the generated image

lora_weights.title: Lora Weights
lora_weights.description: Load LoRA weights. Only works with text to image pipeline. Supports arbitrary .safetensors URLs, tar files, and zip files from the Internet (for example, 'https://huggingface.co/flymy-ai/qwen-image-lora/resolve/main/pytorch_lora_weights.safetensors', 'https://example.com/lora_weights.tar.gz', or 'https://example.com/lora_weights.zip')

enhance_prompt.title: Enhance Prompt
enhance_prompt.description: Enhance the prompt with positive magic.

output_quality.title: Output Quality
output_quality.description: Quality when saving the output images, from 0 to 100. 100 is best quality, 0 is lowest quality. Not relevant for .png outputs

extra_lora_scale.title: Extra Lora Scale
extra_lora_scale.description: Scales for additional LoRAs as an array of numbers (e.g., [0.5, 0.7]). Must match the number of weights in extra_lora_weights.

extra_lora_weights.title: Extra Lora Weights
extra_lora_weights.description: Additional LoRA weights as an array of URLs. Same formats supported as lora_weights (e.g., ['https://huggingface.co/flymy-ai/qwen-image-lora/resolve/main/pytorch_lora_weights.safetensors', 'https://huggingface.co/flymy-ai/qwen-image-realism-lora/resolve/main/flymy_realism.safetensors'])

num_inference_steps.title: Num Inference Steps
num_inference_steps.description: Number of denoising steps. Recommended range is 28-50, and lower number of steps produce lower quality outputs, faster.

disable_safety_checker.title: Disable Safety Checker
disable_safety_checker.description: Disable safety checker for generated images.
